job_tasks.phrase: craft the infrastructure, libraries and tooling to support data ingestion, processing, monitoring and lineage
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibilities of building and managing systems for data handling.

job_tasks.phrase: combine different data sources, both internal and external, and make them available to our stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the task of integrating and providing access to data, a key aspect of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Administer Kafka clusters that play a central role for data exchange in the company
job_tasks.justification: Managing Kafka clusters is a direct data engineering task related to data exchange and pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: Set up and maintain third party tools in Kubernetes that are used for data visualization, discovery and lineage
job_tasks.justification: This involves managing infrastructure (Kubernetes) for tools that support data tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring in Prometheus and Grafana - you build and set up solutions that make sure our systems are operating smoothly
job_tasks.justification: Setting up monitoring solutions like Prometheus and Grafana is a core MLOps/operations task.

job_tasks.phrase: Help improve our CI/CD framework for reliable builds and deployments
job_tasks.justification: Improving CI/CD pipelines is a fundamental part of operations and deployment in an engineering context.

job_tasks.phrase: Write tools and services in Go and Python
job_tasks.justification: This clearly indicates the development of software tools and services.

soft_skills.phrase: smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback
leading with empathy makes us better together
Remote work, flexible hours: ... all in sync with your team's general locations and time zones to foster effective and seamless collaboration.
Annual learning budget: ... pick a learning path which contributes to your career development

classification.rationale: This job description focuses heavily on data engineering and operations tasks, particularly managing infrastructure, data pipelines, and monitoring tools like Kafka, Kubernetes, Prometheus, and Grafana. While Python and Go are mentioned, the core responsibilities do not align with the generative AI or predictive modeling focus of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles. The role is more infrastructure and data platform oriented.
